name: UpdateTeamPermission
description:
Update a team's permission setting in Datadog.

Use this tool to update the permission setting for a specific team in Datadog, allowing for customized access control adjustments.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team for which the permission setting will be updated.

parameters.name: action_to_update
parameters.description: The specific action to update in the team's permission setting, specifying what can be performed.

parameters.name: team_permission_setting_type
parameters.description: Specify the team permission setting type. Required value: 'team_permission_settings'.

parameters.name: allowed_user_type_for_action
parameters.description: Specify the user type permitted to perform the action. Options: admins, members, organization, user_access_manage, teams_manage.

value_schema.description: What type of user is allowed to perform the specified action
